ThingDef.label: scarlet mechanites
ThingDef.description: Wild nanomachines programmed to enhance anything that they stick to. It is extremely difficult to change their default behavior, but it is possible to shape and modify what is left of the organic tissue on them. In large quantities they appear like a dark, shiny gravel, but they are actually soft and semiorganic. \nIt is a mystery who discovered mechanites, but guesses are that archotech researchers produced them first for military usage.
